entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Nipigon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:47 PM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cameron Falls 1:00 PM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022

Humidity: 94 %

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow mixed with freezing rain. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow or freezing rain mixed with ice pellets. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 this afternoon. Forecast issued 12:57 PM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of drizzle. Temperature steady near zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow or ice pellets ending late this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of drizzle. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and overnight. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 6 this evening. Forecast issued 12:57 PM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022
